BodyName: Committee on Consumer and Worker Protection

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to restricting the provision of eating utensils, condiment packets, napkins and extra eating containers, and clarifying the definition of third-party courier service
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Restricting the provision of eating utensils, condiment packets, napkins and extra eating containers, and clarifying the definition of third-party courier service.
